1496330.name: Coloring Pixels - Landmarks Pack
1496330.description:
Landmarks Book

This Landmarks Book brings 20 new, large images to Coloring Pixels, each image depicts famous landmarks from all over the globe! You can now experience the wonders of the world intimately from your PC!


All images are the same large resolution of 200x150 so settle in for a lot of coloring!

Contents

The Landmarks book unlocks the following images:
  • Burj Al Arab - 200x150
  • Neuschwanstein Castle - 200x150
  • Christ The Redeemer - 200x150
  • Brandenburg Gate - 200x150
  • Times Square - 200x150
  • London Eye - 200x150
  • Big Ben - 200x150
  • Giants Causeway- 200x150
  • Space Needle - 200x150
  • Chichen Itza - 200x150
  • Great Pyramids - 200x150
  • Leaning Tower of Pisa - 200x150
  • Tower Bridge - 200x150
  • Stonehenge - 200x150
  • Sultan Ahmed Mosque - 200x150
  • Forbidden City - 200x150
  • Niagara Falls - 200x150
  • Notre Dame - 200x150
  • Sphinx - 200x150
  • White House- 200x150
